#summary List of available shaders.

= Variables for all shaders =

To use one of these variables, just declare uniform with it's name. Example:

{{{
uniform float time;
}}}


||_*Uniform*_||_*Type*_||_*Description*_||
||time||float||Amount of seconds passed from ShaderList loading. Updates every time on each shader activation.||

Add your content here.

= Neck Flashing =

_Name:_ neck

_Using:_ neck.ps, neck.vs

_Description:_ When this shader is enabled, you can see neck flashing when you hit a note.

||_*Uniform*_||_*Type*_||_*Value*_||_*Description*_||
||time||float||variable||Amount of seconds passed from ShaderList loading. Updates every time on each shader activation.||
||fretcol||vec4||variable||Color of flash.||
||failcol||bool||variable||When true, fretboard edges flash with red.||

= Lightning EQ =

_Name:_ stage

_Using:_ lightning.ps, lightning.vs

Description: A big lightning in the center of the screen, acts like equalizer.

||_*Uniform*_||_*Type*_||_*Value*_||_*Description*_||
||time||float||variable||Amount of seconds passed from ShaderList loading. Updates every time on each shader activation.||
||ambientGlow||float||variable||Height of ambient glow||
||color||vec4||variable||Color of teh effect. Depends on pressed frets.||
||glowStrength||float||variable||Brightness of lightning.||
||ambientGlowHeightScale||float||6.0||Scale of ambient glow.||
||glowFallOff||float||variable||Strenght of vertical blur.||
||height||float||variable||Max height of flash.||
||sampleDist||float||0.0076||Strenght of horizontal blur.||
||height||speed||1.86||Speed of 3D texture moving.||
||vertNoise||float||0.78||Distortion of lightning.||
||fading||float||1.0||Fading near the edges of quad.||
||fixalpha||bool||True||Alpha is always 1.0 when True.||
||Noise||sampler3D||"noise.dds"||3D texture.||
||offset||vec2||(0.0,-2.5)||Offset of lightning.||
||scalexy||vec2||(5.0,2.4)||Scale of lightning.||
||solofx||bool||False||Effect is horizontal when True.||

= Solo lightnings =

_Name:_ sololight

_Using:_ lightning.ps, lightning.vs

_Description:_ Lighnings on the edges of fretboard when solo or SP is enabled. Only for GH-like themes.

||_*Uniform*_||_*Type*_||_*Value*_||_*Description*_||
||time||float||variable||Amount of seconds passed from ShaderList loading. Updates every time on each shader activation.||
||ambientGlow||float||0.5||Height of ambient glow||
||color||vec4||variable||Color of teh effect. Depends on SP-note color.||
||glowStrength||float||100.0||Brightness of lightning.||
||ambientGlowHeightScale||float||6.0||Scale of ambient glow.||
||glowFallOff||float||0.024||Strenght of vertical blur.||
||height||float||0.3||Max height of flash.||
||sampleDist||float||0.0076||Strenght of horizontal blur.||
||height||speed||1.86||Speed of 3D texture moving.||
||vertNoise||float||0.78||Distortion of lightning.||
||fading||float||4.0||Fading near the edges of quad.||
||fixalpha||bool||True||Alpha is always 1.0 when True.||
||Noise||sampler3D||"noise.dds"||3D texture.||
||offset||vec2||(0.0,-2.5)||Offset of lightning.||
||scalexy||vec2||(5.0,1.0)||Scale of lightning.||
||solofx||bool||True||Effect is horizontal when True.||
